__e: Okay, so they were cool with me coming out here for a couple of weeks, right, to meet Rita and to meet you, but, you know, they, like we talked about, you know, I, you know,
I know she's fine with Rita, but I just can't help feeling like this is all our fault.
Well, this is Rita's mother and I'm her sister, so can we come in?
Rita never mentioned any of this to you?
Thing is, if Rita hadn't come to me when she did, probably never would have found Noah's body.
- Yes? What you said before... about Rita not being the same person-
She's perfect, because Rita is as damaged as me.
After everything that Rita's done for you. I don't get it.
Is that what Rita needs to see in me?
Look,Rita. He asked me out. He's got blue eyes to die for.
Well, Rita was telling me how, a few years ago, Dan wanted to have another baby but she didn't want to.
But Rita asked me to tell you they re gone.
Rita is, in her own way, as damaged as me.
Rita, she is family, and if there's anybody who understands family, it's you.
Rita has always been the only one for me and he's the only love for me!
